errors.fetch-version: Unable to fetch latest release version from Github

header.pending-txs3: Data you see may not be updated.

errors.no-connections: No connections active, your client is not connected to any other nodes!
errors.no-backend1: Cannot reach backend. Please restart the app and/or seek help on our
errors.csrf: Security vulnerability: CSRF is not working, please exit immediately.

buy.deposit-address: Choose an address to generate a Selected Coin deposit link for:
buy.deposit-location-desc: Choose a wallet where you'd like us to deposit your MDL after we receive your Selected Coin.
buy.wallets-desc: Each time a new wallet and address are selected, a new Selected Coin address is generated. A single MDL address can have up to 5 Selected Coin addresses assigned to it.
buy.send-desc: Send Selected Coin to the address below. Once received, we will deposit the MDL to a new address in the wallet selected above at the current rate of {{ rate }} MDL/Selected Coin.
buy.receive-desc: After receiving your Selected Coin, we'll send you your MDL. Depending on the blockchain and its status, it may take anywhere between 20 minutes or a few hours to receive your MDL. Skycoin and all fiber coins are showing great performance, check it out.
buy.choose-preference: Choose your preferred payment method. Please be aware that some methods can temporarily be disabled.
buy.send-coin-text-1: to the address below. After enough confirmations on the blockchain, you will receive MDL tokens to the wallet selected above at the current rate of

wizard.wallet-desc: If you don't have an MDL wallet, use the generated seed to create a new one. If you already have a wallet, toggle over to "Load Wallet" and enter your seed.
wizard.encrypt-desc: Increase security of your wallet by encrypting it. By entering a password below, your wallet will be encrypted. Only those with the password will be able access the wallet and remove funds.

confirm.title: Safeguard your seed!
confirm.desc: We want to make sure that you wrote down your seed and stored it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you WILL NOT be able to recover your MDL wallet!

new.seed-warning: Remember this seed! Keep it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover your wallet!
new.encrypt-warning: We suggest that you encrypt each one of your wallets with a password. If you forget your password, you can reset it with your seed. Make sure you have your seed saved somewhere safe before encrypting your wallet.

send.change-address-help: Address to receive change. If it's not provided, it will be chosen automatically
send.destinations-help2: Destination addresses, their coins and coin hours
send.value-help: The higher the value, the more token hours will be sent to outputs

backup.seed-warning: BACKUP YOUR SEED. ON PAPER. IN A SAFE PLACE. As long as you have your seed, you can recover your coins.
backup.desc:
Use the table below to get seeds from your encrypted wallets.
To get seeds from unencrypted wallets, open the folder above, open the .wlt files in a text editor and recover the seeds.
